title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Renamed and restructured GitHub Actions secrets documentation, moving from "about-secrets" to "secrets" and adding a new reference page for secrets details.
Updated variables documentation to mention access policies for organization-level variables.
Deprecated Copilot models GPT-4.5 and o1 across billing, troubleshooting, and model selection guides.
Removed references to deprecated Copilot models from pricing tables and feature documentation.
summary:
- Renamed and restructured GitHub Actions secrets documentation, moving from "about-secrets" to "secrets" and adding a new reference page for secrets details.
- Updated variables documentation to mention access policies for organization-level variables.
- Deprecated Copilot models GPT-4.5 and o1 across billing, troubleshooting, and model selection guides.
- Removed references to deprecated Copilot models from pricing tables and feature documentation.
generated_title: Deprecate Copilot o1/GPT-4.5; restructure Actions secrets docs

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Renamed and restructured GitHub Actions secrets documentation, moving from "about-secrets" to "secrets" and adding a new reference page for secrets details.
- Updated variables documentation to mention access policies for organization-level variables.
- Deprecated Copilot models GPT-4.5 and o1 across billing, troubleshooting, and model selection guides.
- Removed references to deprecated Copilot models from pricing tables and feature documentation.

### Title
Deprecate Copilot o1/GPT-4.5; restructure Actions secrets docs
